long_description: The REI Quarter Dome T1 semi-freestanding tent uses lightweight materials and a unique pole design to create a 1-person, 3-season backpacking tent that's roomy, well ventilated and strong. One side-entry door and a large Dry Entry vestibule offer convenient access and ample storage capacity. REI-exclusive Tension Truss design enhances structural stability, prevents deformation in the wind and maximizes room around your head and shoulders. Semi-freestanding tripod design requires less material to keep overall weight low; staking the tent out maximizes interior space. Aluminum DAC Featherlight NSL hubbed poles are lightweight; set-up is quick and easy with pole clips and color coding. Fully adjustable, high-level vents mitigate condensation, drawing cool air under the fly from the lower perimeter and exhausting warm, moist air. Bathtub floor with seam-sealed corners ensures waterproof protection. Windproof, breathable perimeter fabric blocks dust and sand from blowing in under the fly. Silicone-treated, lightweight ripstop nylon fly stays taut in the rain, avoiding moisture-transfer to the tent while keeping you dry. No-Wick welded construction ensures that moisture won't wick through susceptible areas such as guyout points, pole wraps or zippers in wet conditions. REI Quarterdome 1 tent offers multiple interior mesh side pockets and hang loops for organization. Tent door stuffs in its own stash pocket for out-of-the-way convenience. Includes tapered, easy-to-stuff compression stuff sack, 5 stakes, 2 guylines and tighteners, pole repair tube, pole and stake bags.
short_description: The REI Quarter Dome T1 semi-freestanding tent uses lightweight materials and a unique pole design to create a 1-person, 3-season backpacking tent that's roomy, well ventilated and strong.
